original: Bernow, Thyra Gunilla, apotekare, Aseda, f. 23/10/98 i Gbg av Rudolf Åberg o. Agnes Eklöf. G. 37 m. dir. Charles Herman Bernow. — Stud:ex. i Lund 17, farm. kand. 22, apot:ex. 41. Elev v. apot. Lejonet i Kalm. 19-21, anst. i Hemse 22-24, Visby 24-27, Lejonet i Eskilstuna 27-30, i Mölndal 30-38, Delfinen i Gbg, Kronan i Gbg 41- 43, priv. å apot. i Aseda.
translated: Bernow, Thyra Gunilla, pharmacist, Aseda, born on October 23, 1898 in Gothenburg to Rudolf Åberg and Agnes Eklöf. Married in 1937 to director Charles Herman Bernow. She completed her high school studies in Lund in 1917, received her pharmacy degree in 1922, and became a licensed pharmacist in 1941. She was an apprentice at Lejonet Pharmacy in Kalm from 1919-1921, and was employed at pharmacies in Hemse from 1922-1924, Visby from 1924-1927, Lejonet in Eskilstuna from 1927-1930, Mölndal from 1930-1938, Delfinen in Gothenburg, and Kronan in Gothenburg from 1941-1943. She worked privately at a pharmacy in Aseda.
